website_summaries.verdict: While it's an older model, performance is solid and it has many of the premium perks seen in the 2020 design.
pros: Heats up quickly so you can dive into designs
Packaged with 15 refill filaments so you can get started as soon as you open the box
Backed by a one-year satisfaction guarantee
One of the easiest models to learn to use
cons: Some consumers felt the pen wasn't designed to create fine detail, and was better suited for kids than adult creators

customer_reviews.title: Ongoing clogging, slow, uneven flow
customer_reviews.text: The pen is very hard to use and is very frustrating. The flow starts and stops, the pen gets clogged constantly, thin strands of plastic everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it... Plays with it every day... If I had to say anything negative about it it would be that is is a little loud...
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister and she absolutely loves it. She has managed to make some nice little figurines with it, and it seems to be working well for her. 10 / 10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Kardos

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be so fun to try but instead it was very hard to use i.e., not fun! I ended up sending it back for a refund as I was so disappointed in it!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Versatility creativity
customer_reviews.text: I like this pen. It's easy to use. It seems like it is constructed well. I believe that on the last a while. Now this is the things that I do not like about this pen. One it does not have a reverse so I end up wasting a lot of color. My biggest pet peeve of all with this pen is you can only use their brand of filament. That sucks because there's a lot cheaper filament out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun!! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun product! It’s addictive & our entire family, including the grandparents had to get in on the fun. You’re limited only by your imagination. Kids each received one for Christmas so we’ll see how long it lasts. The smell is not overly offensive. We taught them safety procedures & to use the rubber thimbles. We haven’t had any issues. I did purchase a 3D doodle book for initial inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: ZMommy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas. We can’t get ours to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids.  Takes some skill
customer_reviews.text: Suggest you get a kit with shapes & filament to go with the pen. We are happy so far with it. We ordered a less expensive one initially, but it didn't work at all from day 1. So pretty happy this one works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling D.

customer_reviews.title: Good but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 11 year old son... kinda Hard to use..
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! My 13 year old daughter had one and then my 10 year had to get one to. They used them on their own and figured out how to use them themselves. Owned 3 months and still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a gift. She loves it!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy using the 3D Doodler pen!
customer_reviews.text: We like that the pen is easy to use. The pen is easy to load, heats up quickly...plug up and play! We look forward to using on many projects.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria P. Tramel

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift for creating minds!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter had a blast creating in 3D. She loved the item and can’t wait to explore with it more.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy! It's easy to use, and the results are worth displaying. Well, usually. There have been some very silly results at our house, too. The included colors are are very nice and you can make some fun things with them. This pen uses rods, not the rolls of filament some other 3d pens use. Make sure to pay attention to the size, too, if you are buying extra filament. If you stick with the 3Doodler brand, you should be fine. Overall, this is a nice pen to create decorative trinkets like pins and little toys, and some more useful items like small containers.
customer_reviews.author: noone

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use and sturdy too!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third 3D pen. They can not hold up to 10 year old boys very well. This one is the heaviest and easiest to use so far. It uses straight, rod-like filament that is also thicker than the other styles of pens. The filament feeds into pen easily and you van switch colors out with no problems. This pen comes with several fun templates to try. Glasses (see pic) the Eiffel Tower, table coasters. But really, my kid just loves to create. I think, totally worth spending a small amount more to get something that will last more than 30 days. To me, this pen is of higher quality and a better value as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Definite learning curve, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun to use once you get the hang of it. There’s a definite learning curve, but it’s worth the practice if you have plans/designs you’re interested in creating. It comes with a lot of instructions (including a YouTube channel suggestion,) and plenty of materials to get you started. There was a strong burning/chemical smell when the plastic started heating, but I’m sensitive to certain odors and hope it’s just manufacturing residue burning off.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun device. Being an engineer I always have a lot of fun with these new gadgets that keep coming out and this might be my favorite so far. It is very easy to use. I would relate it to like a hot glue gun. It is great for making little plastic figures or for the artistically inclined (not me) you can make some really cool 3D art. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product to have for people who like to create.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to use, this 3D printing pen extrudes heated plastic that cools almost instantly into a Solid, stable structure. The possibilities are endless! If you can scribble, trace, or wave a finger in the air, you can use the 3Doodler create. These are great for kids to just have fun and make anything that they can think of and to use their imagination. Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: S.E. ENT.

customer_reviews.title: Better than original version
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these when they first came out and while the technology is getting better, there is still a long way to go before these are any good. Overall easy to use, simple design. Heats up and melts a filament just enough to allow the user to create a shape. Nice starter.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my niece and nephews for Christmas. When the time came to open their gifts they couldn't wait to play with the 3Doodler pens. We opened all three and not one of them worked. I immediately emailed customer support and never heard back. waste of a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Messy...
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to work with. Rather messy and the pen gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fun crafting gadget
customer_reviews.text: My middle-school-age kids have a lot of fun with the 3Doodler. It is easy to use, and opens up a whole other dimension of possibilities for creative doodling.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This pen is so much fun for our whole family. It comes with a bunch of different colors. It is so easy to use and let's you expand on your creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

product_meta.title: 3Doodler Create+ 3D Printing Pen for Teens, Adults & Creators! - Marine Blue (2019 Model) - with Free Refill Filaments + Stencil Book + Getting Started Guide
product_meta.description: Color:Essentials Set - Marine BlueCompact and easy to use, this 3D printing pen extrudes heated plastic that cools almost instantly into a Solid, stable structure. The possibilities are endless If you can scribble, trace, or wave a finger in the air, you can use the 3Doodler create.
feature_bullets: [ALL NEW DUAL DRIVE TECHNOLOGY] The world’s first in a 3D printing device. Featuring improved power, durability, and reliability for a superior doodling experience.

[THE 3DOODLER APP] Get an interactive experience! The app is packed with dedicated easy to follow stencil section and step by step interactive instructions, receive badges for completed projects and photograph & share your creations directly on social media. The App is fully built on iOS & Android.
[EASY TO USE] Just Plug the 3D Pen in, insert 3Doodler Create plastic, Wait for the 3D Pen to heat up and then you're good to extrude!

[FREE 15 COLORS OF PLASTIC REFILLS & STENCIL BOOK] This 3D Pen comes packed with 15 different colors of 3Doodler Create plastic refills & a comprehensive activity guide book. Comes in a Certified & Sustainable Packaging!

[SMOOTH 3D DRAWING EXPERIENCE] Get the best 3D drawing experience by only using the best and safest non-toxic 3Doodler Create Plastic Filaments. The Create+ 3D Printing pen is compatible with 3Doodler Create 3mm PLA, ABS and Flexy Plastic only.

[NO RISK PURCHASE] 365 days policy. We deliver on our promises & our awesome customer service team is here to help 24/7! You may contact help@the3doodler should you have any questions about your 3Doodler.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
